IBN 24: 7 News reported that a person from Gorai area in Mumbai was forcefully admitted to a hospital and when his family members checked the corpse during cremation, they found that a few organs were missing.
Twitter user Mufti Wahiduzzaman Siddeque: two of which were similar to those in the IBN 24×7 news report.
